product_name: Yakima SuperJoe Pro 3 Bike Trunk Rack
long_description: The Yakima SuperJoe Pro 3 trunk bike rack comes to rescue when you need knockout ease and stability at a heroic price! Durable steel frame geometry ensures superior fit to car while dramatically improving bike fit. Improved QuickTrigger Hub system features an easy-to-use large handle, making setup a breeze. Integrated StableCradles hold bikes securely in place. 1-piece, soft padded feet protect vehicle's finish. 6 retention straps ensure a rock-solid fit; reinforced steel cable glass hatch hooks are included for use on glass trunks or gate mount. Narrow bike arms fit bike frame for easy loading; arms are not foldable. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately). Yakima SuperJoe Pro 3 fits most but not all hatchbacks, vans and SUVs.
short_description: The Yakima SuperJoe Pro 3 trunk bike rack comes to rescue when you need knockout ease and stability at a heroic price!
